00025 CEditableTooltip::CEditableTooltip(CWnd* pParent, CRect r, CString text) {
00026         const FAKE_ID = 4000;
00027         this->pParent = pParent;
00028         this->text = text;
00029         this->r = r;
00030         Create(ES_MULTILINE | WS_CHILD | WS_VISIBLE, r, pParent, FAKE_ID);
00031 }

00033 int CEditableTooltip::OnCreate(LPCREATESTRUCT lpCreateStruct) {
00034         if (CEdit::OnCreate(lpCreateStruct) == -1)
00035                 return -1;      
00036         SetWindowText(text);
00037         SetFocus();
00038         return 0;
00039 }

00044 int CEditableTooltip::DoModal() {
00045         MSG msg;
00046         BOOL bRet;
00047         while( (bRet = GetMessage( &msg, NULL, 0, 0 )) != 0)
00048         {       
00049                 if (bRet == -1)
00050         {
00051             // handle the error and possibly exit
00052         }
00053                 else {
00054                         TranslateMessage(&msg);
00055                         DispatchMessage(&msg);          
00056                         if (msg.message == WM_EDITABLETOOLTIPCLOSE)
00057                                 break; 
00058                 }
00059         }       
00060         return retvalue; 
00061 }
00062 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00063 void CEditableTooltip::OnKeyDown(UINT nChar, UINT nRepCnt, UINT nFlags) 
00064 {
00065         switch (nChar) {
00066                 case VK_RETURN: 
00067                                 retvalue = IDOK;
00068                                 PostMessage(WM_EDITABLETOOLTIPCLOSE);   
00069                                 return;
00070                 case VK_ESCAPE: 
00071                                 retvalue = IDCANCEL;
00072                                 PostMessage(WM_EDITABLETOOLTIPCLOSE);
00073                                 return;
00074         }
00075     CEdit::OnKeyDown(nChar, nRepCnt, nFlags);
00076 }
00077 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00078 void CEditableTooltip::OnChar(UINT nChar, UINT nRepCnt, UINT nFlags) 
00079 {
00080     if(nChar == VK_RETURN)
00081         return; 
00082     CEdit::OnChar(nChar, nRepCnt, nFlags);
00083 }
00084 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00085 void CEditableTooltip::OnKillFocus(CWnd* pNewWnd) {
00086         CWnd::OnKillFocus(pNewWnd);
00087         retvalue = IDCANCEL;
00088         PostMessage(WM_EDITABLETOOLTIPCLOSE);
00089 }
